fullplot: A successful male escort describes in a series of confessions his tangled romantic relationships with his two roommates and an older, enigmatic male client.
plot: A successful male escort describes in a series of confessions his tangled romantic relationships with his two roommates and an older, enigmatic male client.
title: Boy Culture

tomatoes.consensus: Eloquent one-liners and quick pacing make Boy Culture sharper than the typical gay indie flick.

writers: Matthew Rettenmund (based on the novel by)
Philip Pierce (written for the screen by)
Q. Allan Brocka (written for the screen by)
